chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: Starting from 3.1 M2 version JBoss Tools includes new Jboss Maven Integration plug-in which for now allows to create mavenized Seam projects and enable Seam tools support for imported Maven projects.
The Jboss Maven Integration requires m2eclipse to be installed.

note.title: Note:
note.para: For M2 release of Jboss Tools it is important to use m2eclipse stable updatesite or the latest integration build that M2 was developed against. If you want to use the latest development release of m2eclipse you need to use the nightly builds of JBoss Tools.
